channel.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]The navigation bar
channel.description:
I have seen two other threads regarding the navbar, we now have a homepage, but no way to access it from the forums, and yet the IRC is there and so is RS Wiki, I suggest that the current "Home" button redirect to our homepage and add another for to access the board index (forums), the IRC Chat button be renamed to Shoutbox, Chat, or something a little less confusing to new users and finally add a link to the Server Status Page.
Support?
edit: sorry for the redundancy, I know David has a thread about IRC open.

item.title: [RESOLVED - N/A]The navigation bar
